name: Hasher-sha3
tagline: A node.js that can provide with a sha3 hash when a String is input
body:
# Hasher-sha3
===========

* A node.js that can provide with a sha3 hash when a String is input

* SHA3 it seems is not in Node.js crypto library so I need to get it from 
NPM's sha3 module by **Keccak**

* [NPM SHA3](https://npmjs.org/package/sha3) Refer to this page for more information

* Anyway it was not necessary for SHA3 to be used since NIST just had the competition as a namesake to 
appease people who were afraid that SHA2 can be broken. It still cannot be.

***

* This is just a side project related to my work. Might be totally useless to you! :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
